I am familiar to Telugu audiences, but the other language audiences don’t even know me. I am overwhelmed looking at the box office numbers. HanuMan will remain a benchmark film in my career. I extend my heartfelt thanks to the audience.The Superhero flick ‘HanuMan’ takes place in a made-up town named Anjanadari and follows a young guy as he acquires the strength of Lord Hanuman. The story's protagonist, Teja Sajja is just an average person who, one day, gains abilities and discovers a new source of strength inside himself. The mesmerising soundtrack, composed by the brilliant team of Gowrahari, Anudeep Dev, and Krishna Saurabh, adds to the film's charm.This film, which is both written and directed by Prasanth Varma, features Vinay Rai, Raj Deepak Shetty, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Amritha Aiyer. The film's global box office total was over Rs 250 crore.

comments.comment: Looking forward to watching Hanuman! It sounds like an exciting movie.
Teja Sajja is a talented actor. Can't wait to see his portrayal of Hanuman!
Finally, a Telugu superhero movie! Hoping it lives up to expectations.

entertainment.author: Dishya Sharma
entertainment.title: Vikrant Massey BREAKS Silence Over His 'Distasteful' Tweet on Ram-Sita: 'No Intent to Hurt Hindus’ - News18
entertainment.description: Vikrant Massey came under fire after his old controversial tweet featuring Lord Ram and Goddess Sita resurfaced. The actor has now apologised for it.
entertainment.content: Vikrant Massey apologised for an old tweet he shared featuring a cartoon of Lord Ram and Goddess Sita. The actor, who is currently enjoying the success of his film 12t Fail, had shared the tweet in April 2018. The tweet featured an editorial cartoon in which Sita shown making a comment on Ram Bakhts. The post resurfaced recently and Vikrant was slammed for sharing it. Following the backlash, Vikrant deleted the post and apologised to the Hindu community.“In context to one of my Tweets way back in 2018, I’d like to say a few words: It was never my intention to hurt, malign or disrespect the Hindu community. But as I reflect in hindsight about a Tweet made in jest, I also release (realise) the distasteful nature of it. The same could have been said without adding the cartoon which was published in a newspaper,” he said.“I’d with utmost humility like to apologise to each and everyone who has been hurt As you all by now know, that I hold all faiths, beliefs and religions with the highest possible regard. We all grow up with time and reflect upon our mistakes. This was mine. Regards,” Vikrant added.

comments.comment: Respect to Vikrant Massey for acknowledging his mistake and apologizing. It takes courage to do that.
This incident is a reminder to be careful about what we share on social media. It can have real consequences.
Glad Vikrant Massey addressed the issue and cleared the air. Now, let's move on.

entertainment.author: ANI
entertainment.title: Gulzar thanks people for choosing him for Jnanpith Award - Hindustan Times
entertainment.description: According to the selection committee, the 58th Jnanpith Award for the year 2023 has been awarded to Swami Rambhadracharya for Sanskrit and Shri Gulzar for Urdu. | Bollywood
entertainment.content: Legendary lyricist and poet Gulzar will be honoured with the Jnanpith Award. On this, Gulzar expressed gratitude to his fans in a video message. He said, I would like to thank all those people who chose me for the Jnanpith Award and also those people who listen to my poetry and Shayari in the Urdu language.He added, I was thinking that maybe it is because of the film and music, people are not aware of listening to poetry and Shayari. But, when the announcement of the Jnanpith Award came, I felt that people were still interested in listening to Urdu poetry and Shayari. I felt so happy.According to the selection committee, the 58th Jnanpith Award for the year 2023 has been awarded to Swami Rambhadracharya for Sanskrit and Shri Gulzar for Urdu.Sampooran Singh Kalra, popularly known as Gulzar, has penned several memorable and iconic songs in Hindi cinema. He started his career as a lyricist with the film Kabuliwala, starring Balraj Sahni.

comments.comment: Congratulations to Gulzar on receiving the Jnanpith Award! Well-deserved recognition for his contributions to Urdu poetry.
Gulzar's poetry has touched the hearts of millions. He truly deserves this honor.
What a legend! Gulzar Sahab's words have inspired generations. Congratulations!

entertainment.title: Director reacts to comparisons between Operation Valentine and Fighter - 123telugu
entertainment.description: Varun Tej's Operation Valentine, directed by Shakti Pratap Singh, is up for a grand release on 1st March 2024. The movie is based on the Pulwama attack, and
entertainment.content: Varun Tej’s Operation Valentine, directed by Shakti Pratap Singh, is up for a grand release on 1st March 2024. The movie is based on the Pulwama attack, and Varun Tej plays an Air Force pilot. Recently, Hrithik Roshan’s Fighter was centered around the same incident, and hence, people started to draw parallels between these two films.During the trailer launch event, director Shakti Pratap Singh responded to the comparisons. He said, “Ours is a movie about the Indian Air Force. I haven’t seen Fighter. I am sure we are bringing a unique perspective to the audience. Whatever we are showing in our film happens very commonly in the Air Force. But not many people know about it. Operation Valentine is not just about action. It explores the camaraderie and relationship among Air Force pilots.”The movie is produced by Sony Pictures International Productions, Sandeep Mudda’s Renaissance Pictures, and co-produced by God Bless Entertainment (Vakil Khan) and Nandakumar Abbineni. Mickey J. Meyer composed the tunes, while Sai Madhav Burra penned the dialogues.

comments.comment: Operation Valentine seems like a powerful film. Looking forward to its release!
Comparisons between films are inevitable, but each movie has its own unique story and perspective.
Both Operation Valentine and Fighter seem like promising projects. Excited to see how they portray real-life events on screen.

entertainment.title: Yami Gautam extends heartfelt thanks to PM Narendra Modi for 'Article 370' mention in Jammu - The Times of India
entertainment.description: absolute honour to watch PM Modi...', PM Modi says watch article 370, Yami Gautam extends thanks PM Modi, Yami Gautam thanks  PM Narendra Modi, Yami Gautam videos
entertainment.content: New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi recently commended Yami Gautam's upcoming film, ‘Article 360’, praising its portrayal of the real-life issue of Article 370. PM Modi mentioned Article 370 during his speech at a Jammu rally, saying, it will help people in getting correct information.‘Article 370’ is set to be released prior to the Lok Sabha elections of 2024.Narendra Modi expressed his support for the film, stating that it would provide valuable information to the public. He can be heard saying, I have heard that a film on Article 370 is going to be released this week. It is a good thing as it will help people in getting correct information.In response to the Prime Minister's words, Yami expressed her gratitude on social media, describing it as an absolute honour to hear him discuss the film. She wrote, It is an absolute honour to watch PM @narendramodi Ji talk about #Article370Movie. My team and I really hope that we all exceed your expectations in bringing this incredible story to the screen.Article 360 is anticipated to be a significant milestone in Yami Gautam's career, with her portrayal of an intelligence officer tasked with protecting the nation from imminent threats. Against the backdrop of true events, the film promises audiences a compelling narrative enriched with political drama, national security themes, and adrenaline-pumping action sequences.The plot of the film is still up in the air, but it will surely address the government's involvement in revoking Article 370.Directed by Aaditya Suhas Jambhale, ‘Article 360’ features a talented ensemble cast, including Priya Mani, Arun Govil and Vaibhav Tatwawadi, among others. With Yami Gautam leading the way, audiences can expect a captivating performance that elevates the film to new heights.

comments.comment: It's always nice to see celebrities expressing gratitude towards political leaders for their initiatives. Shows a sense of appreciation.
Yami Gautam's gesture is commendable. Acknowledging the efforts of leaders can inspire others to do the same.
Social media has become a powerful tool for expressing gratitude and sharing opinions. It's great to see celebrities using their platforms positively.

entertainment.title: Actor Trisha Reacts To "Vulgar" Comments By AIADMK Member - NDTV
entertainment.description: Popular star Trisha has said she would initiate legal action against derogatory and vulgar comments made against her by an AIADMK functionary. The offensive remarks are now in wide circulation on the internet.
entertainment.content: Actor Trisha Reacts To 'Vulgar' Comments By AIADMK Member Chennai: Popular star Trisha has said she would initiate legal action against derogatory and vulgar comments made against her by an AIADMK functionary. The offensive remarks are now in wide circulation on the internet.Her strong statement on X comes a day after a former AIADMK functionary AV Raju had made vulgar and derogatory comments against her while talking about the 2017 Koovathur Resort episode when AIADMK MLAs were moved there after Jayalalithaa died.It was there that AIADMK leader Edappadi K Palaniswamy was handpicked as Chief Minister by the then party boss Sasikala. Right after that, Sasikala proceeded to a Bengaluru jail to serve the four-year sentence  following her conviction in the disproportionate assets case in which Jayalalithaa was the prime accused.It's disgusting to repeatedly see low lives and despicable human beings who will stoop down to any level to gain attention. Rest assured, necessary and severe action will be taken. Anything that needs to be said and done henceforth will be from my legal department,Trisha said without referring anyone by name.

comments.comment: It's disappointing to see such behavior towards celebrities. Trisha has every right to take legal action against those who make derogatory comments.
Celebrities deserve respect and dignity, just like anyone else. It's important to stand up against cyberbullying and harassment.
The internet can be a toxic place, but it's heartening to see celebrities like Trisha taking a stand against online abuse.

entertainment.author: HT Entertainment Desk
entertainment.title: Jeh turns 3! Mamu Ranbir Kapoor brings Raha to the party. Watch - Hindustan Times
entertainment.description: A bunch of stars and their babies arrived to celebrate the third birthday of Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan's son Jehangir (Jeh). | Bollywood
entertainment.content: The Pataudis threw a grand party to celebrate the third birthday of Jehangir Ali Khan or Jeh baba as he is fondly called. Kareena Kapoor turned up for the party at Mount Mary Road in Mumbai in a green blazer and blue jeans. Saif Ali Khan was his usual chill self in a mauve kurta and white pyjama. Birthday boy Jeh looked adorable in a blue vest, white shirt and black jeans. He seemed to have gotten a fresh haircut too.Also in attendance at the party was Jeh's mamu, Kareena's cousin Ranbir Kapoor. He turned up for the party with his niece, Samaira Sahni. She is the daughter of his sister Riddhima Kapoor Sahni. Later, Ranbir was also seen carrying his daughter Raha in his arms.

comments.comment: Happy 3rd birthday to Jehangir Ali Khan! It's heartwarming to see the Kapoor-Khan family come together to celebrate this special occasion. Wishing Jeh lots of love, happiness, and blessings as he embarks on another year of joyous adventures.

The star-studded celebration of Jeh's third birthday reflects the warmth and camaraderie shared within the Bollywood fraternity. Moments like these remind us of the importance of family and togetherness, transcending the glitz and glamour of the silver screen.

entertainment.author: Shivangini
entertainment.title: Farewell, Binaca Geetmala's ‘Behno aur Bhaiyo’: Radio host Ameen Sayani passes away at 91. Learn more about his career | Mint - Mint
entertainment.description: Ameen Sayani, the iconic announcer of the popular radio show Binaca Geetmala, passed away at 91. He began his career in English radio but found his calling in Hindi broadcasting, becoming a household name with his signature ‘Behno aur Bhaiyo’ greeting.
entertainment.content: Ameen Sayani, the iconic announcer of the popular radio show Binaca Geetmala, passed away at 91. He began his career in English radio but found his calling in Hindi broadcasting, becoming a household name with his signature ‘Behno aur Bhaiyo’ greeting.Ameen Sayani, the mellifluous voice that serenaded generations with his iconic Binaca Geetmala radio programme, passed away peacefully on February 21 at the age of 91.For millions across India and beyond, the mere mention of Binaca Geetmala conjures a wave of nostalgia, instantly transporting them to a time when radio reigned supreme. And at the heart of this magical soundscape, weaving his enchanting spell with each word, was Ameen Sayani – the legendary announcer whose passing today left a void in the nation's cultural tapestry. Born in 1932, Sayani's journey began not with Hindi, the language he so famously mastered, but with English radio programmes in his teens.Sayani's influence extended beyond mere entertainment. He championed progressive social causes, addressing topics like women's empowerment and national unity. His voice resonated with authority and warmth, making him a trusted companion in living rooms across the country. His contributions to the industry were recognised with prestigious awards like the Padma Bhushan and the Padma Vibhushan.

comments.comment: Ameen Sayani's voice was the soundtrack of many childhoods. His contributions to Indian radio broadcasting will always be remembered fondly.
Binaca Geetmala was an integral part of Indian music culture, and Ameen Sayani was its heart. Rest in peace to a legend.

entertainment.title: BTS J-Hope's New Album Tracklist Spoiled? ARMYs Crack The Impossible-To-Read Preview - Koreaboo
entertainment.description: Soon after BIGHIT MUSIC uploaded the preview posters of the new album, hawk-eyed fans got to work, decoding one featuring artist after another!
entertainment.content: On February 18th, KST, BTS Member J Hope surprised fans on his birthday with a teaser of his upcoming project, Hope on the road.GREAT MUSIC then released a new teaser from Hope On The Street Vol 1 On February 20, KST announced that the project would be a two-part release, including a new album and a documentary.The announcement included plans of action and a sneak peek at what will be included in the special album.While BIGHIT MUSIC released the album’s visual previews with some heavy blurring to keep the tracklist and featured artists surprising, ARMYs seem to have decoded some of them with their exceptional hawkish vision.The first artist they discovered was Jungkook. Many agreed that the title of the second song on the tracklist recognizably included “Jung Kook of BTS.

comments.comment: ARMYs are truly detectives when it comes to deciphering clues from BTS teasers! Can't wait for J-Hope's new album!
The dedication and attention to detail that ARMYs show never cease to amaze me. It's incredible how they can decode even the most cryptic hints!
I'm always impressed by the enthusiasm and creativity of BTS fans. Their love for the boys knows no bounds!

entertainment.author: Danielle Chelosky
entertainment.title: Questlove Defends Having Sexyy Red On Roots Picnic Lineup - Stereogum
entertainment.content: On Monday, the Roots Picnic 2024 lineup was announced, featuring Lil Wayne, Jill Scott, André 3000, Victoria Monét, and more. Sexyy Red was also a part of the roster, which prompted backlash. The Roots’ Questlove, though, has come to her defense.On Questlove’s Instagram, fans criticized Sexyy Red for expressing support for Trump (though Lil Wayne has as well) and for being “trashy.” Questlove responded to one of the hateful comments, saying he was “shocked”: “when have you seen a festival in which EVERY ACT is the act you love?” he wrote.

comments.comment: It's great to see artists like Questlove standing up for inclusion and diversity in music. Everyone deserves a chance to showcase their talent!
Music festivals should celebrate a diverse range of artists and genres. Kudos to Questlove for defending the lineup!
Roots Picnic always delivers an amazing lineup! Can't wait to see all the talented artists perform.

entertainment.author: https://www.facebook.com/entertainmentweekly
entertainment.title: Tony Ganios, 'Porky's' and 'The Wanderers' star, dies at 64 - Entertainment Weekly News
entertainment.description: Tony Ganios, best known for playing fan-favorite character Meat in the 'Porky's' films, has died. He was 64.
entertainment.content: Tony Ganios, best known for playing fan-favorite character Meat in the Porky's films, has died. He was 64.Ganios’ fiancée, Amanda Serrano-Ganios, shared the news of his death on social media on Monday night, revealing that he died on Sunday morning following a surgery for a spinal infection.The last words we said to each other were I love you,Serrano-Ganios wrote. Love is an understatement. You are everything to me. My heart, my soul and my best friend. #I love you #tonyganios.Responding to people reacting to the news on social media, she added in a subsequent post, “It's just unreal to me right now. It was so fast. He hadn't felt well and hid it from me for days. When he finally told me, and was taken to the hospital, his spinal cord was severely infected. They did surgery, next morning, his heart stopped. I'm crushed. Serrano-Ganios separately told PEOPLE of the news, I'm just completely empty inside now. He was my best friend, my soul mate. I just love him so much.

comments.comment: Rest in peace, Tony Ganios. Your performances brought joy to many moviegoers. You will be missed.
Tony Ganios was a talented actor who left a lasting impact on the film industry. His legacy will live on through his memorable roles.
Sad to hear about Tony Ganios' passing. He will be remembered for his contributions to cinema.

entertainment.author: https://www.facebook.com/entertainmentweekly
entertainment.title: Beyoncé becomes first Black woman with No. 1 country song - Entertainment Weekly News
entertainment.description: Beyoncé just made country music history, becoming the first Black woman to top the country chart with her No. 1 song 'Texas Hold 'Em.'
entertainment.content: After conquering the world with Renaissance, Beyoncé is continuing to make history with Act II.Billboard announced Tuesday that the Grammy winner hit No. 1 on the Hot Country Songs chart with her new song “Texas Hold ‘Em.” Rolling Stone reports that this achievement makes her the first Black woman to top that chart since its inception in 1958. The song is also No. 2 on the Hot 100 behind Jack Harlow’s “Lovin on Me.”Beyoncé announced her next album on Feb. 11 after teasing new music during a Super Bowl commercial for Verizon. Shortly after the ad premiered, “Texas Hold ‘Em” and “16 Carriages” hit streaming services to immediate success. The former song had 19.2 million official streams, while the latter had 10.3 million streams, which placed it at No. 9 on the country chart.Following fan outcry, Columbia Nashville announced that it would officially promote “Texas Hold ‘Em” to country radio stations on Feb. 14. Though it wasn’t immediately clear whether either song would officially hit country radio, station managers told EW that they were playing “Texas Hold ‘Em” anyway, and that the response had been overwhelmingly positive. “I added the song because it's a great song, and I'm excited because it just sounds so freaking good on the radio,” 93Q Country’s Travis Moon told EW. “And if there are some of her fans who listen to the song on my radio station that like some other songs, that's actually good for my station.”

comments.comment: Congratulations to Beyoncé for breaking yet another barrier in music! She continues to inspire and pave the way for future generations.
Beyoncé's impact on the music industry is truly unparalleled. She consistently raises the bar and pushes boundaries. So proud of her!
This achievement by Beyoncé is not only historic but also a testament to her versatility as an artist. She proves time and again that she can excel in any genre!

entertainment.title: London Fashion Week in pictures: Naomi Campbell makes surprise appearance - BBC.com
entertainment.description: A surprise appearance from the supermodel topped off the 40th anniversary celebrations.
entertainment.content: Original supermodel Naomi Campbell capped off a whirlwind few days at London Fashion Week, which was celebrating its 40th anniversary.As usual, the front rows were packed with celebs looking for the hottest looks to translate from the catwalk to the red carpet.London-born Campbell walked the runway at Burberry's closing show, held at Victoria Park, Tower Hamlets, on Monday.The collection from designer Daniel Lee saw the luxury brand shift towards outdoor-wear (perfect for the rainy capital) in front of a star-studded crowd including Saltburn actor Barry Keoghan, Vogue editor Dame Anna Wintour and One Life star Joanna Lumley. The actress, who famously played fashion director Patsy Stone in BBC sitcom Absolutely Fabulous, had herself taken to the runway for the Completedworks presentation on Friday.

comments.comment: Naomi Campbell's surprise appearance at London Fashion Week added an extra layer of excitement to an already star-studded event. She truly is an icon!
Naomi Campbell remains a timeless figure in the fashion world. Her presence at London Fashion Week is always a highlight!
What a delightful surprise to see Naomi Campbell grace the runway at London Fashion Week! She never fails to captivate with her elegance and poise.

entertainment.author: Zarafshan Shiraz
entertainment.title: 71st Miss World: India's Sini Shetty slays in ₹2.2 lakh red Banarsi silk saree - Hindustan Times
entertainment.description: Red-hot elegance: India's Sini Shetty sets fashion trends ablaze at 71st Miss World premiere in stunning ₹2.2 lakh red Banarsi saree | Viral pictures inside | Fashion Trends
entertainment.content: Though the Miss World will be crowned on March 9 this year, at the Jio Convention World Center, in Mumbai, the opening ceremony kicked off in Delhi's The Ashoka hotel on Tuesday evening where 115 stunning and well-accomplished young women from all continents were introduced to the world in their national costumes and India's Sini Shetty radiated red hot beauty in a luxurious Benaras saree. “Embracing India’s rich heritage with pride on the Miss World stage, draped in the elegance of a saree. This is me, INDIA (sic),” her introduction red.Taking to her social media handle, Sini flooded the Instagram with her dazzling pictures and videos that set the Internet on fire and fashion trends ablaze. “Tracing back thousands of years in Indian history, the saree symbolises the rich history of our culture and the deep-rooted traditions that weave the fabric of our identity,” she quoted as the reason behind her choice of dress for the Miss World opener.

comments.comment: Sini Shetty looked absolutely stunning in that red Banarsi silk saree! She truly knows how to make a fashion statement.
The elegance and grace with which Sini Shetty carried herself in that saree are commendable. She's a true embodiment of beauty and style!
Sini Shetty's choice of attire reflects her impeccable sense of fashion. She stole the show at the Miss World premiere!

entertainment.title: The Beatles: Sir Sam Mendes to direct four films - one about each band member - BBC.com
entertainment.description: Four separate films will tell the story of the band from the perspectives of all four members.
entertainment.content: Director Sir Sam Mendes is to make four separate films about The Beatles - one from each band member's perspective.Sir Paul McCartney, Ringo Starr and the families of John Lennon and George Harrison have all granted permission and music rights for the four films.The Oscar-winning director said he was honoured to be telling the story of the greatest rock band of all time .He added that he was excited to challenge the notion of what constitutes a trip to the movies.It is not clear whether the four films will be released at once or have a staggered rollout, but Sony said they would have an innovative release cadence which would be announced at a later date.The project marks the first time that The Beatles and their company Apple Corps have granted full life story and music rights for a scripted film, according to a statement.Sir Sam has previously directed films such as 1917, American Beauty, Revolutionary Road, Empire of Light and two James Bond movies - Skyfall and Spectre.The Beatles are widely considered the greatest British band of all time thanks to a string of classic albums such as Rubber Soul, Revolver, Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band and Abbey Road.

comments.comment: This sounds like an exciting project! The Beatles have such a rich and fascinating history, and exploring their story from each member's perspective is a brilliant idea.
Sir Sam Mendes is a fantastic director, and I can't wait to see how he brings the stories of each Beatles member to life on the big screen. This project has so much potential!

entertainment.title: Ewen MacIntosh: The Office actor dies aged 50 - BBC.com
entertainment.description: Co-star Ricky Gervais described the actor, who played Big Keith in the show, as an "absolute original".
entertainment.content: Actor and comedian Ewen MacIntosh, best known for his role as Big Keith in The Office, has died aged 50.The character, Keith Bishop, was a scotch egg-loving accountant who had a monotone answerphone message and would have rather had a career as a DJ.MacIntosh also appeared in other British comedies including Miranda and Little Britain.The show's creator Ricky Gervais led the tributes on X/Twitter, describing MacIntosh as an absolute original.Bishop, who worked at fictional paper company Wernham Hogg, will be remembered for scenes such as when he dressed up as Ali G for Red Nose Day.

comments.comment: So sad to hear about Ewen MacIntosh's passing. He brought so much humor and warmth to his role as Big Keith. Rest in peace.
Ewen MacIntosh's portrayal of Big Keith was unforgettable. His comedic timing and delivery were impeccable. He will be greatly missed.

entertainment.author: Sabina Graves
entertainment.title: The Master of the Universe Movie Is Back On, Again
entertainment.description: It seems that by the power of Greyskull, the Master of the Universe movie is back on! New developments have been publicized by Deadline, revealing that Laika ceo and President Travis Knight has pitched his take on the Mattel franchise. Travis is no stranger t…
entertainment.content: It seems that by the power of Greyskull, the Master of the Universe movie is back on! New developments have been publicized by Deadline, revealing that Laika ceo and President Travis Knight has pitched his take on the Mattel franchise. Travis is no stranger to the live-action toy world, having previously directed Bumblebee, the successful Transformers franchise entry starring Hailee Steinfeld (Hawkeye) and John Cena (Coyote vs. Acme).Back in July 2023, The Wrap reported that “Mattel will be searching for a new producing/distribution partner for a big-budget adaptation of the 1980s action figure property, with at least $30 million in development costs already spent since 2007 in prior attempts to make a new movie.”

comments.comment: As a child of the '80s, I couldn't be more excited for the return of Masters of the Universe! Looking forward to seeing Travis Knight's vision for the franchise.
This news brings back so much nostalgia! Can't wait to see He-Man and the Masters of the Universe back on the big screen.
It's fantastic to see iconic properties like Masters of the Universe getting a modern revival. Travis Knight's involvement is icing on the cake!

entertainment.author: Germain Lussier
entertainment.title: Deadpool 3's Trailer Is Here to Save the Marvel Cinematic Universe
entertainment.description: Marvel Studios is only releasing one movie this year—but, from the looks of it, it’s going to be unforgettable. That movie, of course, is Deadpool & Wolverine, which brings the R-rated, fourth-wall-breaking hero from Fox’s X-Men Universe into the Marvel Cinem…
entertainment.content: Marvel Studios is only releasing one movie this year—but, from the looks of it, it’s going to be unforgettable. That movie, of course, is Deadpool & Wolverine, which brings the R-rated, fourth-wall-breaking hero from Fox’s X-Men Universe into the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Ryan Reynolds stars and, this time, he’s bringing along his friend Hugh Jackman as Wolverine.Directed by Shawn Levy, Deadpool 3 is one of the most highly anticipated Marvel films in years and now the first trailer is here. As he celebrates his birthday with his found (and Fox) family, Deadpool’s kidnapped by the TVA and personally invited to join the MCU. But things seemingly don’t go according to plan, and he ends up having to kill a lot of people (as he often does), with Jackman’s Wolverine by his side.Filming only wrapped a few weeks ago, so the fact that we’re getting a trailer at all for this is pretty incredible. So, what do you think?

comments.comment: Deadpool 3 is exactly what the Marvel Cinematic Universe needs right now! Can't wait to see Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman together on screen.
The combination of Deadpool and Wolverine is a dream come true for comic book fans. This movie is going to break records!
The Deadpool 3 trailer looks absolutely hilarious! Ryan Reynolds never fails to deliver the laughs.

entertainment.author: Cheryl Eddy
entertainment.title: A New Evil Dead Movie Is Coming, But How It Fits Is a Mystery
entertainment.description: Last year, Lee Cronin’s Evil Dead Rise put a fresh coat of (pleasingly gory) paint on the much-loved cult horror franchise. Now, there are rumblings anew for the 43-year-old series: a film from emerging horror star Sébastien Vaniček, whose Infested thrilled a…
entertainment.content: Last year, Lee Cronin’s Evil Dead Rise put a fresh coat of (pleasingly gory) paint on the much-loved cult horror franchise. Now, there are rumblings anew for the 43-year-old series: a film from emerging horror star Sébastien Vaniček, whose Infested thrilled audiences at Fantastic Fest last year and will stream on Shudder later in 2024. But it won’t exactly be another Evil Dead sequel.According to Deadline, which broke the news, Vaniček will co-write and direct “a new spin-off of the Evil Dead franchise for Sam Raimi and Robert Tapert’s Ghost House Pictures,” with plot details still “under wraps.” This is an intriguing way to frame the new entry, which has already seen a trio of original films (1981's The Evil Dead, 1987's Evil Dead Rise, and 1992's Army of Darkness, all directed by Raimi and starring Bruce Campbell); the 2013 reboot from Fede Álvarez, who has a new Alien movie coming this year; and the Starz TV series Ash vs. Evil Dead, which also starred Campbell and ran from 2015-2018. And, of course, there was 2023's Evil Dead Rise, which earned critical praise and went on to become the highest-grossing film in the series to date—and is more of a standalone, spinning out the mythology of Raimi’s creation with new characters and a new setting.

comments.comment: Evil Dead is one of my favorite horror franchises! Can't wait to see what Sébastien Vaniček brings to the table with this new movie.
I'm hoping for plenty of blood, guts, and scares in the new Evil Dead movie. Sébastien Vaniček has big shoes to fill, but I have high hopes!
The Evil Dead series has always been a wild ride. Excited to see where they take it next with this mysterious new movie!

entertainment.author: IANS
entertainment.title: Emraan Hashmi shares what he dislikes about film producers
entertainment.description: Bollywood actor Emraan Hashmi shares his dislike for film producers in the Hindi film industry, specifically those focused solely on return on investment rather than producing quality content. Find out more about his thoughts and his upcoming webseries 'Showt…
entertainment.content: Bollywood actor Emraan Hashmi, who plays a producer in his upcoming webseries ‘Showtime’, has shared one thing that he dislikes about producers in the Hindi film industry.The actor spoke to producer-director Karan Johar at the show’s trailer launch when KJo asked him about the one thing that he dislikes about his community of producers.The actor shared that he doesn’t align with thought-process of a producer whose single point focus is the return on investment and not producing quality content.Emraan Hashmi told KJo: Barring you, this is for some of the producers I’ve worked with. I think some producers are purely driven by the commerce in films, and I think that's a bit of thing that doesn’t align with my thinking because they look at film only as a proposal and people, who work in the film, only as commodities.”He further mentioned: “I’m a creative person, and by the way, I’m terrible at commerce, that's why I never became a producer. I’m driven by the emotions and passion in films. Any producer, who is passionate, I align with them , that's my concern with a producer.

comments.comment: Emraan Hashmi's honesty is refreshing! It's important for actors to speak out about issues in the industry.
It's unfortunate that profit often takes precedence over quality in the film industry. Kudos to Emraan Hashmi for shedding light on this issue.
Emraan Hashmi's perspective sheds light on the challenges faced by artists in Bollywood. It's time for a shift towards prioritizing creativity over commercial success.

While 2023 had its share of thrilling releases, 2024 promises an even more spectacular array of web shows that will undoubtedly captivate audiences. Read on to discover some of the highly anticipated OTT releases that are bound to keep you on the edge of your seat....The eagerly awaited return of several beloved series is set to captivate audiences once again. 'Mirzapur' promises an intensified narrative as Guddu Pandit takes control from Kaleen Bhaiya, setting the stage for a power struggle in the upcoming season. Meanwhile, 'The Family Man' gears up for its third season, continuing the gripping saga of Srikant Tiwari as he balances national security threats with personal challenges. 'Delhi Crime' is poised to enthrall viewers with another season of real-life crime narratives, featuring stellar performances from Shefali Shah, Rasika Dugal, and Rajesh Tailang. Additionally, Bobby Deol returns to the screen in 'Aashram,' reprising his role as Baba Nirala, promising fans more intrigue, suspense, and the pursuit of justice in the face of compelling cliffhangers. With each series offering its unique blend of drama, suspense, and character-driven storytelling, fans can anticipate an immersive viewing experience as these highly anticipated seasons unfold.

The variety of content on OTT platforms is staggering. Looking forward to binge-watching these upcoming web series!
Web series have revolutionized the entertainment industry. Can't wait to see what new stories and characters these shows bring!

entertainment.author: Tatiana Tenreyro
entertainment.title: ‘Irish Wish’ Trailer: Lindsay Lohan Swaps Lives Again in Netflix Rom-Com - Hollywood Reporter
entertainment.description: The actress' upcoming flick is reminiscent of her previous movies 'Just My Luck' and 'Freaky Friday.'
entertainment.content: Lindsay Lohan is giving fans a dose of nostalgia by starring in another life-swapping movie — this time for Netflix.In rom-com Irish Wish, Lohan plays Maddie, who is down on her luck when the love of her life gets engaged to her best friend. While in Ireland for the destination wedding, Maddie wishes she was the one marrying him and wakes up as the bride-to-be. Is the man she thought was her true love really the one even though he’s betrothed to someone else, or will she fall for someone else?In the trailer, Maddie travels to Ireland for the nuptials of Paul (Alexander Vlahos), a writer for whom she’s been working as a book editor. On her way to the wedding’s location, she meets a handsome Irish stranger (Ed Speleers) on a bus but realizes that she’s hung up on Paul. While Maddie regrets not telling Paul how she feels, she doesn’t want to ruin his wedding, as he’s engaged to her best friend, Emma (Elizabeth Tan).

comments.comment: Excited to see Lindsay Lohan back on the screen! Her previous movies like 'Just My Luck' and 'Freaky Friday' were so much fun. Can't wait to watch 'Irish Wish'!
Lindsay Lohan's return to romantic comedies brings a sense of nostalgia. It's always refreshing to see her in light-hearted roles, and 'Irish Wish' seems like the perfect feel-good movie to watch!

entertainment.author: Shalmesh More
entertainment.title: Fighter At Worldwide Box Office (25 Days): Hrithik Roshan’s Magnum Opus Beats The Lifetime Of RRR (Hindi)! - Koimoi
entertainment.description: Hrithik Roshan-led magnum opus, Fighter, has completed 25 days at the worldwide box office, and here's where it stands!
entertainment.content:
Fighter At Worldwide Box Office (25 Days) (Picture Credit: Facebook)
Hrithik Roshan-led Fighter continues to churn out numbers at the worldwide box office, though its now on the lower side. Hrithik Roshan-led Fighter continues to churn out numbers at the worldwide box office, though it’s now on the lower side. The film recently completed 25 days in theatres and now, in the latest development, it has surpassed the lifetime collection of RRR’s Hindi version. Keep reading to know more!Directed by Siddharth Anand, the magnum opus was released in theatres on 25th January. Upon its release, the film generally received favorable reviews, and word-of-mouth was inclined more in favor. However, the urban feel and niche genre of aerial action drama restricted the content from reaching a wider audience section. With good support in the mass centers, the picture could have been much different.Fighter completed 25 days at the worldwide box office this Sunday. In this theatrical journey, the film earned 208.50 crores net at the Indian box office, which equals 246.03 crores gross. In the overseas market, it has earned an impressive collection of 98 crores gross. Combining Indian gross and overseas gross, the global total stands at 344.03 crores gross.

comments.comment: Congratulations to the team of Fighter for its success at the worldwide box office! Hrithik Roshan's performance and the action-packed storyline have surely resonated with audiences.
It's impressive to see Fighter surpassing the lifetime collections of RRR (Hindi) in just 25 days! This speaks volumes about the film's popularity and the star power of Hrithik Roshan.

entertainment.title: Vidya Balan Files Police Complaint Against Fake Instagram Account Extorting Money In Her Name - NDTV Movies
entertainment.description: According to Mumbai police, an unknown person who created an identical Instagram ID asked people for money by assuring them of jobs
entertainment.content: Mumbai (Maharashtra): Actor Vidya Balan had lodged an FIR against an unknown person with Mumbai Police for creating a fake Instagram account in her name and asking for money from people.According to Mumbai police, an unknown person who created an identical Instagram ID asked people for money by assuring them of jobs. Khar Police has registered an FIR under Section 66 (C) of IT.Vidya Balan has many followers online and she keeps creating videos and reels that are loved by her fans. This issue has created a serious problem for her as someone is misusing her name and asking for money from people.A police officer said that an unknown person created an identical Instagram ID of Vidya Balan and also created a Gmail account and then using those accounts, he started contacting people associated with Bollywood.Police further said that he was asking people for money by assuring them of jobs. When Vidya Balan came to know about this, she complained to Mumbai Police. Based on Balan's complaint, Khar Police registered an FIR against an unknown person under Section 66 (C) of IT and an investigation has started. She has earlier also mentioned the case in her Instagram stories about how someone was running an account in her name.Meanwhile, talking about Vidya's work front, she is all set to return to the Bhool Bhulaiyaa franchise.The ace actor is known for essaying the role of Manjulika in the 2007 psychological horror-comedy film Bhool Bhulaiyaa. On Monday, actor Kartik Aaryan, who headlined the second part and will also be seen in a lead role in the third part, welcomed Vidya on board.

comments.comment: It's alarming how easily people can fall victim to such scams. Kudos to Vidya Balan for taking action against this fraudulent activity.
This incident highlights the importance of vigilance and caution while interacting on social media platforms. Glad to see celebrities using their influence to combat such scams.

entertainment.author: HT Entertainment Desk
entertainment.title: Vishal supports Trisha; calls former AIADMK member ‘stupid idiot’ - Hindustan Times
entertainment.description: Former AIADMK member AV Raju recently made defamatory comments about Trisha and the actor threatened legal action against him.
entertainment.content: After Mansoor Ali Khan, former AIADMK member AV Raju recently made offensive comments against Trisha. The actor took to X to call him out and also threatened legal action against him. Actor Vishal, who is the general secretary of the artists association also took to X to condemn Raju’s statements, calling him 'a stupid idiot.’ (Also Read: Trisha furious at former AIADMK member's ‘disgusting’ comments on her: ‘Low life and despicable human being’)In a long post, where he refused to name Trisha or Raju, Vishal wrote, “I just heard that a stupid idiot from a political party spoke very ill and disgustingly about someone from our film fraternity. I will not mention your name nor the name of the person you targeted because I know you did it for publicity. I definitely will not mention names because we are not just good friends but also mutual co artistes in the film fraternity. (sic)”He went on to write that he hopes that the women in Raju’s home call him out, adding, “What you have done is absolutely filthy and not worth mentioning, But these particular ppl mean a lot personally and professionally. Honestly, I don't want to condemn you, which is an understatement, but I hope you rot in hell. (sic)” He also claimed that Raju did it just for publicity, “Of course, this has become a trend of trying to make money out of negative publicity about celebrities. Get a job, a better job. (sic)”

comments.comment: It's unfortunate to see individuals resorting to defamation and slander. Kudos to Vishal for standing up against such behavior and supporting Trisha.
Trisha deserves all the support she can get. It's heartening to see Vishal and others in the industry rallying behind her.

entertainment.author: JENNIFER PELTZ Associated Press
entertainment.title: Welcome to the 'Hotel California' case: The trial over handwritten lyrics to an Eagles classic - ABC News
entertainment.description: An unusual criminal trial is set to open over the handwritten lyrics to a classic rock blockbuster: the Eagles' “Hotel California.”
entertainment.content: NEW YORK -- In the mid-1970s, the Eagles were working on a spooky, cryptic new song.On a lined yellow pad, Don Henley, with input from band co-founder Glenn Frey, jotted thoughts about “a dark desert highway and “a lovely place” with a luxurious surface and ominous undertones. And something on ice, perhaps caviar or Taittinger — or pink Champagne?The song, “Hotel California,” became one of rock's most indelible singles. And nearly a half-century later, those handwritten pages of lyrics-in-the-making have become the center of an unusual criminal trial set to open Wednesday.Rare-book dealer Glenn Horowitz, former Rock & Roll Hall of Fame curator Craig Inciardi and memorabilia seller Edward Kosinski are charged with conspiring to own and try to sell manuscripts of “Hotel California” and other Eagles hits without the right to do so.The three have pleaded not guilty, and their lawyers have said the men committed no crime with the papers, which they acquired via a writer who'd worked with the Eagles. But the Manhattan district attorney’s office says the defendants connived to obscure the documents’ disputed ownership, despite knowing that Henley said the pages were stolen.Clashes over valuable collectibles abound, but criminal trials like this are rare. Many fights are resolved in private, in lawsuits or with agreements to return the items.“If you can avoid a prosecution by handing over the thing, most people just hand it over, said Travis McDade, a University of Illinois law professor who studies rare document disputes.

comments.comment: The legal battle over the 'Hotel California' lyrics is certainly intriguing. It will be interesting to see how this case unfolds.
As a fan of the Eagles, I'm fascinated by this trial. 'Hotel California' is such an iconic song, and the story behind its lyrics adds another layer of interest.

entertainment.author: EunhaYi
entertainment.title: 'Marry My Husband' becomes first K-drama to top Amazon Prime Video's global charts - allkpop
entertainment.description: 'Marry My Husband', the latest production from Studio Dragon, has not only captivated domestic audiences but also made waves internationall…
entertainment.content: 436 NEWS Posted by EunhaYi   2 days ago 'Marry My Husband' becomes first K-drama to top Amazon Prime Video's global charts AKP STAFF'Marry My Husband', the latest production from Studio Dragon, has not only captivated domestic audiences but also made waves internationally, etching its name in the annals of K-drama history.Following the global success of 'The Glory' last year, Studio Dragon has reaffirmed its status as a powerhouse in the K-drama realm with the triumphant reception of 'Marry My Husband'. The drama, which aired on tvN and TVING domestically and streamed on Amazon Prime Video overseas, concluded on February 20 KST, leaving an indelible mark on the global television landscape.Breaking barriers, 'Marry My Husband' became the first K-drama to clinch the top spot in the global daily TV show rankings on Amazon Prime Video since the platform's inception in 2016. In January, it soared to the second-highest position, setting a new record not only in daily rankings but also in monthly rankings, a testament to its enduring appeal. Viewers worldwide were swept up in the 'Marry My Husband craze', drawn to the drama's riveting storyline of reincarnation and revenge over its two-month run.The drama's popularity transcended borders, captivating audiences not only in Asia but also across Western countries. Achieving first place in daily rankings in a staggering 67 countries during its broadcast period, including Japan, Australia, and Taiwan, 'Marry My Husband' made history by claiming top spots in the US, Canada, England, and other European nations. Additionally, it secured spots in the Amazon Prime Video TOP 10 in various American and European countries, solidifying its global reach.

comments.comment: 'Marry My Husband' making history on Amazon Prime Video is a testament to the global appeal of K-dramas. Exciting times for fans of Korean entertainment!
It's incredible to see a K-drama topping global charts. 'Marry My Husband' is definitely on my watchlist now!

entertainment.author: Dishya Sharma
entertainment.title: Vikrant Massey BREAKS Silence Over His 'Distasteful' Tweet on Ram-Sita: 'No Intent to Hurt Hindus’ - News18
entertainment.description: Vikrant Massey came under fire after his old controversial tweet featuring Lord Ram and Goddess Sita resurfaced. The actor has now apologised for it.
entertainment.content: Vikrant Massey apologised for an old tweet he shared featuring a cartoon of Lord Ram and Goddess Sita. The actor, who is currently enjoying the success of his film 12t Fail, had shared the tweet in April 2018. The tweet featured an editorial cartoon in which Sita shown making a comment on Ram Bakhts. The post resurfaced recently and Vikrant was slammed for sharing it. Following the backlash, Vikrant deleted the post and apologised to the Hindu community.“In context to one of my Tweets way back in 2018, I’d like to say a few words: It was never my intention to hurt, malign or disrespect the Hindu community. But as I reflect in hindsight about a Tweet made in jest, I also release (realise) the distasteful nature of it. The same could have been said without adding the cartoon which was published in a newspaper,” he said.“I’d with utmost humility like to apologise to each and everyone who has been hurt As you all by now know, that I hold all faiths, beliefs and religions with the highest possible regard. We all grow up with time and reflect upon our mistakes. This was mine. Regards,” Vikrant added.

comments.comment: Social media posts can have significant repercussions, especially when they touch on sensitive religious topics. It's commendable that Vikrant Massey addressed the situation and apologized.
It's important for public figures to be mindful of their social media presence and the impact of their posts. Vikrant Massey's apology is a step in the right direction.

entertainment.author: Leah Degrazia
entertainment.title: Kelly Rowland's Rep Speaks Out Amid Dressing Room Debacle - E! NEWS
entertainment.description: Kelly Rowland's rep shared a statement after the Destiny's Child alum allegedly backed out of a Today show appearance at the last minute over an issue with her dressing room.
entertainment.content: Kelly Rowland is no bug-a-boo.In fact, her rep had nothing but good things to say when speaking out on the Destiny's Child alum after she allegedly bowed out of a Today show appearance at the last minute over a problem with her dressing room. After 28 years of knowing her, the rep told Entertainment Tonight Feb. 20, Kelly Rowland remains one of the kindest, most amiable humans I have ever met and have had the blessing to represent.The statement came less than a week after Kelly was supposed to co-host the Feb. 15 segment of Hoda & Jenna alongside Hoda Kotb while Jenna Bush Hager was off. However, shortly before the fourth hour of the Today show was supposed to begin, Kelly reportedly fell dangerously out of love with the dressing room she was given and had to be replaced with Rita Ora, who was also a scheduled guest that day.

comments.comment: Issues surrounding celebrity appearances can sometimes overshadow the actual content being promoted. It's good to see Kelly Rowland's rep addressing the situation promptly.
Kelly Rowland's professionalism shines through despite the dressing room debacle. Her rep's statement reflects positively on her handling of the situation.

entertainment.description: KIm Soo Hyun And Kim Ji Won Are A Couple Experiencing The Ups And Downs Of Marriage In “Queen Of Tears” Posters
entertainment.content: tvNs Queen of Tears has unveiled new posters! Penned by “Crash Landing on You,” “My Love From the Star,” and “The Producers” writer Park Ji Eun, “Queen of Tears” will tell the miraculous, thrilling, and humorous love story of a married couple who manage to survive a crisis and stay together against all odds. Kim Soo Hyun will star as Baek Hyeon Woo, the legal director of the conglomerate Queens Group, while Kim Ji Won will play his wife Hong Hae In, the chaebol heiress known as the “queen” of Queens Group’s department stores.In a newly released poster, the two stand face-to-face in front of a romantic backdrop. In contrast to the breathtaking scenery behind them, Baek Hyeon Woo and Hong Hae In gaze at each other with stiff and cold expressions. The text, “We married because we were in love, but why don’t we love each other after getting married?” hints at their strained marriage.Another poster depicts the two enjoying time to themselves amidst a field of pink flowers which is full of the heartwarming vibes of spring. The text, “Right this moment, a love story that is miraculously starting anew,” conveys heart-fluttering excitement to viewers, raising anticipation for what will cause the two to start feeling love for one another again.“Queen of Tears” will premiere on March 9 at 9:20 p.m. KST.

comments.comment: Excited to see Kim Soo Hyun and Kim Ji Won together in Queen of Tears! They are both incredibly talented actors, and I'm sure they will deliver amazing performances.
The posters look intriguing! Can't wait to watch this drama and see how the storyline unfolds. Hoping for a great chemistry between the leads.

business.author: Selena Li, Lawrence White
business.title: HSBC's $3 bln China writedown mars record annual profit
business.description: HSBC Holdings reported a record annual profit, that nonetheless came in below analysts' forecasts as the income boost from higher interest rates was offset by a hefty $3 billion charge from its stake in a Chinese bank.
business.content: HONG KONG/LONDON, Feb 21 (Reuters) - HSBC Holdings (HSBA.L), opens new tab on Wednesday reported a shock $3 billion charge on its stake in a Chinese bank amid mounting bad loans in the country, sending the British bank's shares plunging and taking the shine off its record annual profit.HSBC's shares slid as much as 8% in London, heading for their worst single-day drop since the COVID-19 pandemic erupted in March 2020HSBC's $3 billion impairment on its stake in China's Bank of Communications (BoCom) is the largest yet by an overseas lender, as the country's real estate crisis deepens and its economic recovery stalls.Chief Executive Noel Quinn told reporters the writedown had not been triggered by any conversations with regulators, but came as accounting rules triggered a review of the value HSBC assigned to its 19% stake in BoCom.The bank's annual report released on Tuesday said that recent macroeconomic, policy and industry-wide factors resulted in a wider range of valuations for HSBC's BoCom stake than had previously been the case.

comments.comment: HSBC's performance reflects the complexities of the global banking landscape. The China writedown underscores the challenges faced by multinational financial institutions.
The $3 billion writedown in China is significant and could have implications for HSBC's future strategies in the region.

business.title: Reliance's Hanooman: An AI model backed by Mukesh Ambani speeds toward a March India rollout
business.description: BharatGPT, a consortium backed by Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Industries Ltd., is set to launch Hanooman, a ChatGPT-style service, in collaboration with Indian Institute of Technology universities. It aims to overcome computational constraints, offer speech-to-t…
business.content: A consortium backed by Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance Industries Ltd. and India’s top engineering schools aim to launch its first ChatGPT-style service next month, a big step in the country’s ambitions to become a player in the field of artificial intelligence.The BharatGPT group, encompassing an arm of India’s most valuable company and eight affiliated universities, offered a sneak peek of the large language model Tuesday during a technology conference in Mumbai. In a video played before delegates, a motorcycle mechanic in southern India queried an AI bot in his native Tamil, a banker conversed with the tool in Hindi, and a developer in Hyderabad used it to write computer code.The model has been dubbed Hanooman and represents India's race to develop potentially transformative AI technology. The model will work via 11 local languages in four fields: health care, governance, financial services and education.

comments.comment: Reliance's initiative to launch Hanooman showcases India's growing prowess in AI and technology innovation. It will be fascinating to see how this AI model contributes to various sectors.

business.author: Annie Palmer
business.title: Jeff Bezos unloads around $2.4 billion in Amazon stock, bringing recent sales to 50 million shares
business.description: Bezos has been aggressively selling Amazon stock since he disclosed a plan to sell up to 50 million shares in the company before Jan. 31, 2025.
business.content: Amazon founder and executive chairman Jeff Bezos unloaded more than 14 million shares of his company valued at roughly $2.4 billion, bringing the total sold since the start of the month to 50 million.The sales began late last week and continued through Tuesday, according to a securities filing. In total, Bezos sold 14,006,906 shares in the company for about $2.37 billion, the filing states.The sales were executed under a prearranged trading plan that Bezos adopted in November and disclosed earlier this month, which said he could sell up to 50 million Amazon shares before Jan. 31, 2025.Bezos sold about 12 million Amazon shares, worth approximately $2.03 billion, last week, in addition to another tranche of 12 million shares just days before. He unloaded another 12 million shares the week before that.Bezos’ stock sales have accelerated since he announced last November he would leave Seattle and move to Miami, allowing him to be closer to fiancée Lauren Sanchez and his parents, as well as Blue Origin’s operations.

comments.comment: Jeff Bezos' sale of Amazon stock could indicate various factors, including diversification of wealth and investment strategies. It will be interesting to see how this impacts Amazon's valuation.

business.author: PTI
business.title: Tata Steel, JSW Steel Among Bidders For Mines Under Commercial Coal Block Auction
business.description: "A total of 27 companies including major companies like Tata Steel Ltd, JSW Steel Ltd, Rungta Sons Pvt Ltd., etc.  have submitted their bids in the auction process," the coal ministry said in a statement.
business.content: Tata Steel, JSW Steel and Rungta Sons are among the 27 companies which have submitted bids for coal blocks put up for commercial mines auction, the government said on Tuesday. A total of 27 companies including major companies like Tata Steel Ltd, JSW Steel Ltd, Rungta Sons Pvt Ltd., etc. have submitted their bids in the auction process, the coal ministry said in a statement.Other companies which submitted bids include ACC Ltdd, J K Cement and Thriveni Earthmovers.A total of 27 coal mines have been put up for auction in the ninth round of auction. A total of 33 bids were received for 13 coal mines.Under the second attempt of the seventh round of auction, a total of five coal mines were put up for auction and seven bids were received against three coal mines, the coal ministry said.The online bids were decrypted and opened electronically in the presence of the bidders. Subsequently, sealed envelopes containing offline bid documents were also opened in the presence of bidders. Entire process was displayed on the screen for the bidders, the ministry said.In 2020, Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched the auction process for 41 coal blocks for commercial mining, a move that opened India's coal sector for private players.

comments.comment: The participation of major steel companies like Tata Steel and JSW Steel in the commercial coal block auction reflects the significance of the coal sector in India's industrial landscape.
The outcome of the auction will likely have implications for the steel industry and the broader economy. It will be interesting to see how the bidding process unfolds.

business.author: AFP
business.title: HSBC profits soar in 2023, announces share buyback despite geopolitical, economic concerns
business.description: HSBC reported a record profit in 2023, with pre-tax gains surging by nearly 80%.
business.content: HSBC said Wednesday it achieved record profit in 2023 as pre-tax gains soared by nearly 80 percent, with the banking giant also announcing further share buybacks.The Asia-focused lender and its peers have been buoyed by rising interest rates for more than a year, but are bracing for greater economic uncertainties in 2024.The bank generates most of its revenue in Asia and has spent several years pivoting to the region, vowing to develop its wealth business and target fast-growing markets.Despite bumper profits, HSBC noted the effects of China's slower-than-expected economic recovery after the Covid-19 pandemic as well as heightened geopolitical tensions.The firm reported pre-tax profits of $30.3 billion, up from $17.1 billion the year before, in a statement to the Hong Kong stock exchange.Profit after tax increased by $8.3 billion, to $24.6 billion.Our record profit performance in 2023 enabled us to reward our shareholders with our highest full-year dividend since 2008,said chief executive Noel Quinn.

comments.comment: HSBC's strong financial performance in 2023 despite geopolitical and economic challenges underscores the resilience of the banking sector. The share buyback announcement is likely to boost investor confidence.
HSBC's record profit in 2023 reflects its ability to navigate through turbulent times effectively. The share buyback decision indicates the company's confidence in its future prospects.

science.author: India Today Science Desk
science.title: Two giant planets collide outside Solar System. Both worlds get liquified
science.description: The two giant exoplanets anywhere from several to tens of Earth masses have crashed into one another
science.content: In what could be a cataclysmic event that shows the brutal nature of the universe, two giant planets outside the solar system have collided with each other.The two giant exoplanets anywhere from several to tens of Earth masses crashed into one another, creating both the infrared spike and the cloud that was picked up by astronomers on Earth.Astronomers, who noticed the bang, said that a crash like this would completely liquify the two planets, leaving behind a single molten core surrounded by a cloud of gas, hot rock, and dust. Surprisingly, this cloud was still orbiting the star, like the glowing remains of the two worlds.

comments.comment: The collision of two giant exoplanets offers a rare glimpse into the violent events that shape planetary systems beyond our own. Understanding such phenomena is crucial for unraveling the mysteries of planetary formation and evolution.

The liquification of both worlds resulting from the collision underscores the immense energy involved in such cosmic events. Studying the aftermath can provide valuable insights into the physical processes governing planetary dynamics.

science.title: Mysterious wave leaves scientists puzzled, as giant cosmic serpent slithers into Milky Way
science.description:
A huge, wave-shaped structure, which extended some 9,000 light-years in length and curled around the Milky Way's spiral arm, was first found by scientists a few years ago. 

The wave, called as Radcliffe Wave, was a line of star-forming gas and its discovery …
science.content: A huge, wave-shaped structure, which extended some 9,000 light-years in length and curled around the Milky Way's spiral arm, was first found by scientists a few years ago. The wave, called as Radcliffe Wave, was a line of star-forming gas and its discovery by scientists was remarkable. However, now removing one of the clouds from this mysterious cosmic serpent, scientists have found that it is moving in our galaxy. A team of scientists, headed by astrophysicist Ralf Konietzka of Harvard University, have now discovered that the Radcliffe Wave, just like other objects in the Milky Way, is in motion.

comments.comment: The discovery of the Radcliffe Wave challenges existing models of galactic structure and raises intriguing questions about the dynamics of the Milky Way. Further research into this phenomenon could revolutionize our understanding of galactic evolution.

The enigmatic nature of the Radcliffe Wave highlights the complexity of galactic dynamics and underscores the need for interdisciplinary collaboration in astrophysical research. Exploring the origins and implications of this cosmic serpent promises to yield groundbreaking insights into the structure of the Milky Way.

science.author: India Today Science Desk
science.title: Private IM-1 mission captures Moon as it preps to enter lunar orbit
science.description: The spacecraft developed by Intuitive Machines completed two out of three Trajectory Correction Maneuvers TCM on its way to the Moon The two manoeuvres were so precise that the team ruled out the third TCM
science.content: Days after it was launched from Earth, the IM-1 mission, a private spacecraft selected by Nasa is on the verge of touching the Moon as the team prepares to put it into lunar orbit. The spacecraft, dubbed Odysseus, developed by Intuitive Machines, completed two out of three Trajectory Correction Maneuvers (TCM) on its way to the Moon. The two manoeuvres were so precise that the team ruled out the third TCM.Intuitive Machines flight controllers commanded the IM-1 mission’s second planned Trajectory Correction Maneuver (TCM) with enough precision to eliminate the need for the initially planned third TCM engine firing. Odysseus continues to be in excellent health, the team said in an update.

comments.comment: The successful trajectory correction maneuvers of the IM-1 mission demonstrate the precision and reliability of modern space exploration technology. This milestone brings humanity one step closer to unlocking the potential of lunar exploration and utilization.

The imminent entry of the IM-1 mission into lunar orbit marks a significant achievement in the burgeoning era of commercial space exploration. This mission not only advances our scientific understanding of the Moon but also paves the way for future lunar missions and space ventures.

science.author: Web Desk
science.title: AstroSat observatory unravels mysteries of black hole X-Ray binary system
science.description: India's pioneering space astronomy observatory, AstroSat, has facilitated an international team of scientists in uncovering the enigmatic nature of the X-ray binary system known as MAXI J1820+070
science.content: India's pioneering space astronomy observatory, AstroSat, has facilitated an international team of scientists in uncovering the enigmatic nature of the X-ray binary system known as MAXI J1820+070, home to a black hole, announced ISRO. X-ray binaries, named for their emission of X-rays, comprise a normal star and a collapsed star, which may manifest as a white dwarf, neutron star, or a black hole, as per NASA. MAXI J1820+070 is identified as a low-mass X-ray binary housing a black hole as a compact entity. The study, titled A Multi-Wavelength Spectral Study of MAXI J1820+070 in the Soft and Hard States, conducted by an international team, provides distinctive insights into the behavior of this transient black hole X-ray binary during its 2018 outburst, said a statrement from the ISRO.

comments.comment: The insights provided by the AstroSat observatory into the X-ray binary system MAXI J1820+070 deepen our understanding of the behavior and interactions of black holes and companion stars. This collaborative effort showcases the importance of international cooperation in advancing space science.

AstroSat's role in unraveling the mysteries of black hole X-ray binary systems underscores the significance of India's contributions to space astronomy. This groundbreaking research enhances our knowledge of celestial phenomena and opens new avenues for studying the cosmos.

science.author: Livemint
science.title: NASA's spacecraft grabs 4.5 billion-year-old rocks from asteroid; Here's what it reveals about earliest signs of life
science.description: NASA's spacecraft grabs 4.5 billion-year-old rocks from asteroid that may reveal the earliest signs of life.
science.content: NASA scientists recently conducted a study on asteroid rocks that their spacecraft took from a distant "potentially hazardous" asteroid. The findings reveal that the spacecraft managed to take hold of a significant portion of the asteroid, almost more than double what was expected.In 2023, the OSIRIS-REx capsule was taken to NASA's Johnson Space Center in Houston following its touchdown in the Utah desert on September 24. At the Centre, researchers commenced work to disassemble the capsule which was much trickier than expected as two of the capsule's 35 fasteners were stuck. Hence, NASA scientists initially were able to collect only about 2.48 ounces (70.3 grams) of the sample that happened to be resting on the lid of the canister.

comments.comment: The retrieval of 4.5 billion-year-old rocks from an asteroid represents a significant milestone in space exploration and planetary science. Analysis of these ancient samples may offer invaluable insights into the early solar system and the conditions that led to the emergence of life on Earth.

Studying the composition of these ancient asteroid rocks provides a window into the primordial conditions of our solar system. The data gathered by NASA's spacecraft promises to shed light on the processes that shaped the formation and evolution of celestial bodies, including Earth.

science.author: sahas, Buzz Staff
science.title: How Passing Stars Affect Earth's Orbit And Change Its Climate
science.description: A study claimed that when stars passed by our solar system millions of years ago, the temperature of Earth witnessed an increase in temperature by 8 degrees Celsius.
science.content: For centuries, it has been believed that apart from the position of the planets, even stars have an impact on humans. Now, a recent study by scientists has found that apart from the Sun, the other stars can also have a great impact on Earth and may even change its orbit. They claim that the gravitational pull of the stars can change the orbit of the Earth, which can unfortunately cause havoc on the planet’s climate.A study titled Passing Stars as an Important Driver of Paleoclimate and the Solar System’s Orbital Evolution, published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters led by Sean Raymond and Nathan A Kaib claimed that when stars passed by our solar system millions of years ago, the temperature of Earth witnessed an increase in temperature by 8 degrees Celsius.

comments.comment: The study revealing the impact of passing stars on Earth's climate sheds light on the complex interplay between celestial bodies and our planet's environment. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for comprehending Earth's long-term climatic variations.

The findings highlight the significant role that cosmic events play in shaping Earth's climate over geological timescales. Further research in this area could provide valuable insights into past climate fluctuations and help predict future changes.

science.title: Space debris: 'Grandfather satellite' due to fall to Earth
science.description: Europe's pioneering ERS-2 Earth observation spacecraft will make an uncontrolled dive to destruction.
science.content: A European satellite that pioneered many of the technologies used to monitor the planet and its climate has fallen to Earth.The two-tonne ERS-2 spacecraft burnt up in the atmosphere over the Pacific.So far, there have been no eyewitness accounts of the mission's demise or of any debris reaching Earth's surface.ERS-2 was one of a pair of missions launched by the European Space Agency in the 1990s to study the atmosphere, the land and the oceans in novel ways.The duo monitored floods, measured continental and ocean-surface temperatures, traced the movement of ice fields, and sensed the ground buckle during earthquakes.And ERS-2, specifically, introduced a new ability to assess Earth's protective ozone layer.The satellite's return was expected, although uncontrolled. It had no functioning propulsion system to direct its fiery plunge.

comments.comment: The re-entry of the ERS-2 satellite serves as a reminder of the growing issue of space debris and the need for sustainable practices in space exploration. Efforts to mitigate the risks associated with orbital debris are crucial for the safety of future space missions.

The uncontrolled re-entry of the ERS-2 satellite underscores the challenges posed by space debris management. Initiatives to track and monitor space junk are essential for minimizing the potential hazards to spacecraft and satellites in Earth's orbit.

science.author: Keith Cooper
science.title: Scientists say 2 solar system dwarf planets may harbor underground oceans
science.description: The puzzling presence of a certain flavor of methane on Eris and Makemake could be hinting at their warm, watery interiors.
science.content: Two dwarf planets within our solar system, named Eris and Makemake, might exhibit enough geothermal activity to maintain oceans of liquid water within, according to modeling that describes new observations made with the James Webb Space Telescope.We see some interesting signs of hot times in cool places, said Christopher Glein, a planetary geochemist from Texas Southwest Research Institute, in a statement.Found deep in the Kuiper Belt, Eris is the icy world that, when it was discovered in January 2005, threw Pluto's status in the solar system into crisis. Just 44 kilometers (27 miles) smaller than Pluto but 25% more massive thanks to a greater concentration of rock in its core, Eris became the prototype dwarf planet. Pluto was inevitably forced to follow suit. Makemake (pronounced Mah-kay-Mah-kay) was spotted two months after Eris, and at 1430 km (888 miles) across is about 1000 km (about 600 miles) smaller than Eris and Pluto.

comments.comment: The discovery of potential underground oceans on Eris and Makemake opens intriguing possibilities for understanding the evolution and habitability of dwarf planets in our solar system. Further exploration and analysis are necessary to confirm these findings and their implications.

The presence of underground oceans on Eris and Makemake adds to the growing body of evidence suggesting that icy bodies in the outer solar system may harbor liquid water beneath their surfaces. These findings have implications for the search for extraterrestrial life in our solar neighborhood.

science.author: Ben Turner
science.title: James Webb telescope finds ancient galaxy larger than our Milky Way, and it's threatening to upend cosmology
science.description: Astronomers believe the first galaxies formed around giant halos of dark matter. But a newly discovered galaxy dating to roughly 13 billion years ago mysteriously appeared long before that process should have occurred.
science.content:
The James Webb Space Telescope
 (JWST) has found a galaxy in the early universe that's so massive, it shouldn't exist, posing a "significant challenge" to the standard model of cosmology, The galaxy, called ZF-UDS-7329, contains more stars than the Milky Way, despite having formed only 800 million years into the universe's 13.8 billion-year life span. This means they were somehow born without dark matter seeding their formation, contrary to what the standard model of galaxy formation suggests.How this could have happened is unclear, but much like previous JWST discoveries of other inexplicably massive galaxies in the early universe, it threatens to upend our understanding of how the first matter in the universe formed, or possibly even the standard model of cosmology itself. The researchers published their findings Feb. 14 in the journal Nature.

comments.comment: The discovery of an ancient galaxy larger than the Milky Way challenges our current understanding of galaxy formation and cosmology. Further observations and analysis with the James Webb Space Telescope will provide valuable insights into the early universe and its evolution.

The identification of a massive ancient galaxy poses intriguing questions about the early universe and the processes that led to the formation of such colossal structures. Continued study of this galaxy with advanced telescopes like JWST will deepen our understanding of cosmic evolution.

science.title: SpaceX launches Indonesian satellite on a Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral
science.description: The launch of Telkomsat’s Merah Putih 2 satellite came more than five years after the company’s last launch aboard a SpaceX rocket. Liftoff occurred at the opening of a two-hour window at 3:11 p.m
science.content: A Falcon 9 rocket supporting the Telkomsat Merah Putih 2 mission launches from Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station on Feb. 20, 2024. Image: Adam Bernstein/Spaceflight Indonesia aims to increase broadband internet access across its country through the launch of its latest communications satellite aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket. The Telkomsat HTS 113BT satellite, also referred to as Merah Putih 2, lifted off from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station at 3:11 p.m. EST (2011 UTC).Despite some windy conditions, the Falcon 9 rocket was able to leap off the pad at the start of its two-hour launch window.

comments.comment: The successful launch of the Telkomsat Merah Putih 2 satellite underscores SpaceX's continued contributions to the global satellite communications industry. These advancements in space technology play a crucial role in expanding connectivity and improving communication networks worldwide.

SpaceX's deployment of the Indonesian communications satellite highlights the growing importance of space-based telecommunications infrastructure in facilitating global connectivity. Such launches contribute to the development of a more interconnected and accessible world.

science.description: The spacecraft developed by Intuitive Machines completed two out of three Trajectory Correction Maneuvers TCM on its way to the Moon The two manoeuvres were so precise that the team ruled out the third TCM
science.content: Days after it was launched from Earth, the IM-1 mission, a private spacecraft selected by Nasa is on the verge of touching the Moon as the team prepares to put it into lunar orbit. The spacecraft, dubbed Odysseus, developed by Intuitive Machines, completed two out of three Trajectory Correction Maneuvers (TCM) on its way to the Moon. The two manoeuvres were so precise that the team ruled out the third TCM.The team will now insert the spacecraft into lunar orbit as they prepare to land it close to the Moon's South Pole, a region that so far has only been visited by India with the landing of the Chandrayaan-3 mission.Ahead of the insertion, the spacecraft caught the first glimpse of its destination and beamed back a stunning image of the moon from space. Odysseus captured the image approximately 1,00,000km from the Moon using its Terrain Relative Navigation camera.
